channel.title: admin on Rafael Angarita
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Rafael Angarita

item.description: I am an Associate Professor of Computer Science since September 2022 at Paris Nanterre University where I teach all about databases at the Economics, Management, Mathematics and Computer Science department (SEGMI) and Scientific Collaborator at Inria, MiMove team since 2017. From 2017 to 2022, I was at Isep where I was the head of the Information Systems track and program director of the Data Protection Officer Master. Before joining Isep, I was a postdoctoral researcher at at Inria, MiMove team.
